    • Method Detail

      • resolveDependency

        org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact resolveDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency dependency)
                                                     throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves a dependency into an artifact If the artifact's file is the project directory (i.e. artifact was resolved my m2e to a workspace project), will throw a MojoExecutionException.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency to resolve
        Returns:
        An artifact for the dependency, whose file is an archive of the dependency
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the dependency cannot be resolved, or it is resolved to a project directory.

      • resolveDependency

        org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact resolveDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency dependency,
                                                   Path archiveInProject)
                                                     throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves a dependency into an artifact If the artifact's file is the project's build output directory (i.e. artifact was resolved my m2e to a workspace project), will attempt to locate the archive inside the project's directory with the path archiveInProject and set that as the artifact's file, or throw a MojoExecutionException.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency to resolve
        archiveInProject - The path where to search for the artifact archive under the project directory.
        Returns:
        An artifact for the dependency, whose file is an archive of the dependency
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the dependency cannot be resolved, or it is resolved to an unbuilt project directory.

      • resolveDependency

        org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact resolveDependency(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency dependency,
                                                   com.google.common.base.Function<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact,Path> archiveInProject)
                                                     throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves a dependency into an artifact If the artifact's file is the project's build output directory (i.e. artifact was resolved my m2e to a workspace project), will attempt to locate the archive inside the project's directory with the path archiveInProject and set that as the artifact's file, or throw a MojoExecutionException.
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency to resolve
        archiveInProject - The path where to search for the artifact archive under the project directory.
        Returns:
        An artifact for the dependency, whose file is an archive of the dependency
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the dependency cannot be resolved, or it is resolved to an unbuilt project directory.

      • resolveDependencyUnsafe

        org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact resolveDependencyUnsafe(org.apache.maven.model.Dependency dependency)
                                                           throws org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Resolves a dependency into an artifact If the artifact's file is the project's build output directory (i.e. artifact was resolved my m2e to a workspace project), will return the project's build output directory as resolved by m2e
        Parameters:
        dependency - The dependency to resolve
        Returns:
        An artifact for the dependency, whose file is an archive of the dependency
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException - if the dependency cannot be resolved.
